trans-unit.source: Extends the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> interface by providing advanced sorting and filtering capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 扩展<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref>接口通过提供高级排序和筛选功能。

trans-unit.source: With the IBindingListView interface, you implement advanced sorting as a set of property descriptor-direction pairs.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IBindingListView 接口中，可以做到只为一组的属性描述符方向对高级排序。

trans-unit.source: You implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
trans-unit.target: 你实现筛选为要由数据源实现解释的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The IBindingListView interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: IBindingListView 接口实现的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source based on the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 排序数据源基于给定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection, once constructed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>是只读的集合，一次构造。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> containing the sorts to apply to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>包含排序要应用于数据源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter to be used to exclude items from the collection of items returned by the data source
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于从数据源返回的项的集合中排除项的筛选器

trans-unit.source: Your implementation of the Filter property should exhibit the following behavior when the Filter property is set: The data source returns only the items that meet the filter criteria when the list is accessed by item index or when the list is enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 在筛选器属性设置时，筛选器属性的实现应出现以下行为︰ 数据源返回仅访问列表的项索引或枚举列表时满足筛选条件的项。

trans-unit.source: The definition of the filter string is dependent on the data-source implementation, but the behavior associated with setting the filter should be modeled on <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器字符串的定义是依赖于数据源实现中，但与设置筛选器关联的行为应<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>建模

trans-unit.source: The string used to filter items out in the item collection returned by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 用于筛选出的数据源返回的项集合中的项的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current filter applied to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 删除当前筛选器应用于数据源。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> type, you implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>类型，则实现筛选为要由数据源实现解释的字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of sort descriptions currently applied to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前应用于数据源的说明的排序的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection, once constructed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>是只读的集合，一次构造。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"></xref> currently applied to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>当前应用于数据源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports advanced sorting.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示数据源是否支持高级排序。

trans-unit.source: Advanced sorting refers to the ability to sort by multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 高级排序是指能够通过多个列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source supports advanced sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据源支持高级排序，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports filtering.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示数据源是否支持筛选。

trans-unit.source: With the SupportsFiltering property, you implement filtering as a string to be interpreted by the data source implementation.
trans-unit.target: 与 SupportsFiltering 属性，则实现筛选为要由数据源实现解释的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source supports filtering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据源支持筛选，则，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
